titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Nathaniel Gaither, Jr.
CWG8297

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Military Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND, DIVIDED WE FALL.
KENTUCKY.
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteer Militia,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE,
Frankfort, 12 Feb 1862.

Hon:
Nat Gaither Jr
Sec of State.

Comms: issd 19th Novr 1861_ to
Francis Montgomery- Captain
Daniel B. Good- 1st Lieut
Hardin F. Judd -- 2d Lieut
Edmund Penn- Captain
William T. Munell_ 1st Lieut
Joseph Russell- 2d Lieut
These Companies are disbanded-

Jacob Miller Com: as Captain dated 18 December 1861, should be 23d September 1861, Please change this_
The Com: which is, issued 1 Feb 1862 to Francis Maximillian Taylor Asst Surg: should be Frederic Maximillian Taylor.

I am sorry for this trouble, but it is not our fault-
-- I send Millers' Com: properly dated if you think best you can mark the first cancelled & record this-

Very Resply
John W. Finnell
Adjt Genl
